name: Gale
flavor: The most common Windbound discipline, masters of the Gale Stance control powerful gusts of wind and create minor tornadoes.

stances.name: Breeze Stance
stances.desc: By manipulating the wind across the battlefield you grant your allies a favorable tailwind, enhancing their speed and mobility.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you _Push_, _Pull_, _Slide_, or allow an ally to Move, gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you inflict _Accelerate_ on an ally they may Move 2.

stances.name: Razor Wind Stance
stances.desc: You know how to focus wind into a razor's edge, causing it to bite deeper and leave more significant wounds.
stances.accumulate: Whenever you create a _Windy_ space or Crit with a _Wind_ Attack gain 1 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Expand the Crit range with Wind Attacks by 1. When you Crit, you may add _Bleed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) to the Attack.

stances.name: Squall Stance
stances.desc: By unleashing powerful, concentrated blasts of air, practitioners of the Squall Stance keep their foes off-balance and unable to strike.
stances.effect: If you _Stagger_ a foe you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to add _Prone_ (1 _Grit_) to the Attack.

techniques.name: Biting Winds
techniques.desc: You amplify the wind, creating a steep punishment for a foe who attempts to move through it.
techniques.trigger: A creature moves against the direction of a _Windy_ space.
techniques.effect: The Triggering creature chooses: Either they suffer _Push_ 2 in the direction of the _Windy_ space OR you Attack them using the below profile. The Target may pay 1 _Grit_ to reduce the effect to _Push_ 1 or imposive Disadvantage on the attack or 2 _Grit_ to ignore this Reaction.
techniques.special: You may repeat this Reaction as many times as it is triggered by paying the Cost again.

techniques.name: Vacuum Strike
techniques.desc: As you strike with your weapon you launch a focused blast of air, amplifying and extending the strike.
techniques.effect: Attack using your Weapon's Profile, adding _Bleed_ 1 (1 _Reflex_) on a Hit and _Bleed_ 2 (2 _Reflex_) on a Crit. After attacking, repeat this Attack with Disadvantage in a Line 4 behind the Target.

techniques.name: Air Slash
techniques.desc: You fling out a sharpened edge of wind, cutting just as true as any blade.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Add _Stagger_ (1 _Momentum_) to this Attack. Reduce this Cost by 1 if you Crit.

techniques.name: Air Blast
techniques.desc: You unleash a sudden blast of air, knocking a foe back and off-balance.
techniques.special: The Target may pay 1 _Momentum_ to, rather than rolling, treat the Attack Roll as a 10.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_. Repeat this Strike immediately after using it.

techniques.name: Air Cutter
techniques.desc: You create a blade of compressed wind in your hand, forging a razor-sharp, invisible blade.
techniques.effect: Equip the Air Cutter Spirit Weapon in your Open Hand. This Enchant ends if you have no Air Cutter Wielded.
techniques.boost: 0 _Momentum_. If you have two Open Hands, you may equip a Air Cutter in each.

techniques.name: Headwind
techniques.desc: You create a powerful gust of wind and maintain it, forcing foes to slowly advance.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. Immediately after, the Area becomes _Windy_, with the direction pointing directly away from you. While this Enchant is active the Area remains _Windy_ and moves with you. You may pay 1 _Momentum_ to change the direction at the start or end your turn. You may end this _Enchant_ as a Reaction to inflict _Stagger_ (2 _Grit_) on all foes in the area.
techniques.boost: 2 _Momentum_. Area is instead a 3x6 Line and the Cost increases to 2.

techniques.name: Swift Breeze
techniques.desc: You bring a breeze in from an odd angle, creating a wave across the battlefield and maneuvering a creature.
techniques.effect: Attack with the below Profile. You may make any spaces a creature is _Slide_d through becomes _Windy_ until the end of the Round.
techniques.special: The Target may pay 1 _Momentum_ to, rather than rolling, treat the Attack Roll as a 10.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Inflict either _Accelerate_ or _Stagger_ (2 _Momentum_) on the Target.

techniques.name: Whirlwind
techniques.desc: You twist and turn the wind about yourself, creating a vortex of wind.
techniques.cost: 1 _Momentum_ at Refresh every Round this Enchant persists.
techniques.effect: Make the Area _Windy_, with the direction of all spaces pointing either directly towards the center of the area or directly away from the center. The center space is not windy.
techniques.special:
Depending on the direction of the _Windy_ spaces, you gain one of the two following Reactions while this Enchant persists:
Inward: If a Ranged Attack enters any of the Area, you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to make it instead Target the creature in the center of the Area.
Outward: If a Ranged Attack would pass through the Area, you may pay 2 _Momentum_ to allow the attacker to instead have the attack originate from any _Windy_ space in the Area.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. You may take this Boost at the start of any Turn. Move the Area 2 in any direction.
1 _Momentum_. Instead of a Blast 1, Area is instead Burst 1 and Range is Self. The Area moves with you and is always centered on you.

techniques.name: Updraft
techniques.desc: You provide an updraft for an ally, allowing them to quickly launch themselves into the air.
techniques.trigger: You or an allied creature enters a _Windy_ space.
techniques.effect: The target creature may immediately _Flying_ Move 2.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. _Accelerate_ the Target.
1 _Reflex_. Trigger instead becomes 'You or an allied creature starts their turn.'

techniques.name: Tailwind
techniques.desc: You dash forward at a rapid speed, granting a bit of the wind's speed to another.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Create two _Windy_ spaces adjacent to you at the end of your Movement.
techniques.imbue: 1 _Focus_: Instead, Movement is Shift, Speed is 2, and you may _Accelerate_ two creatures.

techniques.name: Whirlwind Charge
techniques.desc: You sprint forward with reckless blast of air, blazing a path forward.
techniques.effect: The Movement granted by this Action must be in a straight line. Make all spaces of your choice you pass through _Windy_ until the end of the Round.
techniques.boost:
1 _Momentum_. You do  not have to move in a straight line.
1 _Momentum_. _Pull_ 2 (1 _Grit_) a creature you move through or adjacent to, treating the oring as wherever you end your movement.

techniques.name: Wind Breaker
techniques.desc: You unleash a sudden gust, knocking a projectile out of the sky.
techniques.trigger: You or a creature within Range is Attacked with a Ranged Attack.
techniques.effect: Reroll the Attack and use the lower result.
techniques.special: Reduce the Cost by 1 if the creature being Attacked is in a _Windy_ space.

name: Storm
flavor: Channeling the essence of a thunderstorm, the Storm Stance creates powerful bursts of lighting that ripple over the battlefield.

stances.name: Bolt Stance
stances.desc: You control the storms in a direct fashion: you simply unleash it in as direct a way as possible, unleashing its devastating potential.
stances.accumulate: Every time you Hit with a Storm Attack gain 1 _Momentum_, every time you Crit gain 2 _Momentum_.
stances.effect: Whenever you use a Storm Technique that inflicts _Shock_ you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to inflict no _Shock_ and instead add _Pierce_ equal to the _Shock_ that would have been inflicted.

stances.name: Charged Stance
stances.desc: You hold the storm within yourself, something that carries a great amount of risk but also amplifies your power greatly.
stances.accumulate: At Refresh, convert up to 4 _Shock_ into _Momentum_.
stances.effect: All _Evade_ and _Block_ Reactions have their Cost increased by 1 against your Storm Attacks with _Stall_.
stances.special: Whenever you Hit or Crit with an Attack you may pay 1 _Momentum_ to clear 2 _Shock_ from yourself and add _Shock_ 2 (2 _Grit_) to the Attack.

stances.name: Stormcaller Stance
stances.desc: You are adept at conducting lighting in the environment itself, calling down lighting in unexpected and dangerous ways.
stances.effect: Whenever a Storm Technique allows you to create a Hazard, you may create one more.

techniques.name: Lightning Palm
techniques.desc: You conjure a shocking burst in your hand, unleashing it at point blank for a powerful strike.
techniques.boost: 1 _Momentum_: Add _Expose_ 1 to the Attack and increase the cost to Negate by 1.

techniques.name: Discharge
techniques.desc: You let loose a barrage of energy at close range, amplifying it with any power stored within.
techniques.effect: Clear up to 4 _Shock_, then Attack with the below Profile. If you Graze, add half the cleared _Shock_ to the Damage. On a _Hit_ or _Crit_, add all cleared _Shock_ to the Damage.
techniques.special: You may clear additional _Shock_ as a part of this Attack, but take 2 True Damage for each additional _Shock_ cleared.
techniques.boost: 3 _Momentum_: Clear 2 more _Shock_, but don't add it to the Damage or take Damage from it. If you do, Area becomes Burst 2.

techniques.name: Charge
techniques.desc: You pull in nearby electricity, building up an electrical charge within yourself.
techniques.effect: Gain 2 _Shock_ and 1 _Reflex_. Gain a +1 Attack Bonus on your next Storm Attack.

name: Zephyr
flavor: The Zephyr Stance carries the body aloft, allowing speed and reactions that push the limits of human capability and even flight.

name: Howl
flavor: Howl Stance masters channel ancient, primal fear of storms and winds to shake enemies to their core, sending them fleeing from the battle.

name: Windwhisper
flavor: The Windwhisper Stance reads currents in the air, allowing an incredible ability to predict and react to attacks.
